description: Manage Azure Cosmos DB for PostgreSQL node configurations.

commands.name: az cosmosdb postgres configuration node show
commands.summary: Get information of a configuration for worker nodes.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb postgres configuration node show [--cluster-name]
                                             [--configuration-name]
                                             [--ids]
                                             [--resource-group]
                                             [--subscription]
examples: az cosmosdb postgres configuration node show -n "array_nulls" --cluster-name "test-cluster" -g "testGroup" --subscription "ffffffff-ffff-ffff-ffff-ffffffffffff"

commands.name: az cosmosdb postgres configuration node update
commands.summary: Updates configuration of worker nodes in a cluster.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb postgres configuration node update [--cluster-name]
                                               [--configuration-name]
                                               [--ids]
                                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                               [--resource-group]
                                               [--subscription]
                                               [--value]
examples: az cosmosdb postgres configuration node update -n "array_nulls" --value "off" --cluster-name "test-cluster" -g "testGroup" --subscription "ffffffff-ffff-ffff-ffff-ffffffffffff"

commands.name: az cosmosdb postgres configuration node wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb postgres configuration node wait [--cluster-name]
                                             [--configuration-name]
                                             [--created]
                                             [--custom]
                                             [--deleted]
                                             [--exists]
                                             [--ids]
                                             [--interval]
                                             [--resource-group]
                                             [--subscription]
                                             [--timeout]
                                             [--updated]
